title: Selfish Request for a 1v1 against a Rioter
body:
Hey, all. Been playing since season 1/2, and I wanted to kinda poke people’s brains/make a selfish request. So, I *think* I understand this correctly: I recently saw a thread with a Rioter who played a friendly 1v1 with a player who I *think* was playing his 1000th game. I’ll admit that I find that pretty dope, and had I realized that this was a thing earlier, I probably would’ve taken advantage of it.

So, I know it’s selfish, but I gotta ask: any possibility I could test my mettle against one of Riot’s own? I’m waaaaay past 1000 games, I know, and I totally get if the answer’s no, but I figured there’s no harm in at least asking...

...Right?
